suite.doc:
Books Library API Test Suite - REST API Validation
This test suite validates the Books Library REST API endpoints using modern Robot Framework 7.4.1 syntax with full HTTP operations.
API endpoints tested: - GET /books/ (list all books) - POST /books/ (create new book) - GET /books/{id} (get specific book) - PUT /books/{id} (update existing book) - DELETE /books/{id} (delete book) - PATCH /books/{id}/favorite (toggle favorite status)

suite.name: Books Ui

test.doc: Validates complete book creation workflow through web UI

test.name: User Should Be Able To Search For Books By Title

kw.name: Given User Is On Books Library Homepage
New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://books-service:8000
kw.doc: Open a new Page.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector #books-list at state visible
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
Opens browser and navigates to Books Library main page

Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the count of elements found with ``selector``.

kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.arg: Sample books not available for testing
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

Wait For Elements State

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

suite.doc:
Books Library UI Test Suite - Gherkin Style
This test suite validates the Books Library web application UI functionality using modern Robot Framework 7.4.1 syntax with Gherkin-style keywords.
Test focus areas: - Book creation through web form - Book listing and display validation - Search and filter functionality - Favorite books management - Error handling for invalid inputs
